attributes.review: I literally almost threw up at the sight of that picture when i first opened the app so i guess your app is based on traumatizing people and using your platform to hate on individuals and minorities that aren’t white cis gendered straight males. who let a rapist into the white house. you dragged our country into the dirt. back to the 1920s  so i guess that was your version of great maga for the white males.
attributes.title: Hey cheeto puff

attributes.review: Me and my little baby girl we’re trying to download this app and i was trying to show her our cult ways and our traditions. the app seemed to be working perfectly but then the whole thing just glitches and a picture of a cheeto naked getting a spray tan popped up! you are very rude donald j trump! my daughter now doesn’t have 20/20 vision thanks you to! i hate you! you stupid orange!😾
attributes.title: DISGRACE

attributes.review: I opened the app and my baby 👶 was sitting in my lap and he instantly👏 closed it three times before I actually got to look 👀 at the home 🏠 page... after seeing the home page I immediately had to run 🏃‍♀️ to the bathroom and throw up 🤢🤮. My baby 👶 saw my phone 📱 and crawled towards it ⬅️ he saw the pictures 👀📷 and went blind 👀🚫🙀✨
attributes.title: My baby cried and is now blind.

attributes.review: The first thing I saw when I opened this app is an orangutan posing as a man. I could clearly see his disguise poor thing he needs to go home in the jungle but we’re polluting the earth. Anyway his neck flab’s were showing and it just offended me. Whoever rated this app a 5 is probably homophobic, racist, and supports someone who likes touching and degrading women.
attributes.title: This app is so offensive towards my generation and eyes.

attributes.review: oh. my. GOD. this app took a literal MONTH to download. while it was downloading, i couldn’t open any other apps besides messages and phone/facetime. AND THERES NOTHING I COULD DO ABOUT IT!!!!! when it finally downloads, I CANT EVEN OPEN IT!!!!!!!!!!!!! it turns my screen to black and it just takes me back to the home screen. IMPECCIBLE. i wish i never downloaded this app. definitely not voting for trump now.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE

attributes.review: This app took days to download and when it finally did it took up almost half the storage in my phone to the point where i thought i had downloaded a virus. When i opened the app it was a glitchy mess and i couldn’t scroll. There were so many advertisements that wherever i clicked it tried to get me to pay. I WILL NEVER DOWNLOAD ANYTHING LIKE THIS AGAIN
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS

attributes.review:
Let’s start off with the negatives the app took forever to download. When I finally got the app to download it 
asked for all types of information which I am not comfortable giving out I came on this app to educate myself. It made my hamster Kyle die from a heart attack because of the fluorescent orange shoe of his skin. The all Powerful Cheeto man is such a disgrace and I’m embarrassed for him
attributes.title: Worst app ever made

attributes.review: this app took weeks to download and i couldn’t do anything else on my phone. i couldn’t reach my mom as i was having anxiety about trump. i couldn’t do anything. don’t get this app. trump will be so sad that i couldn’t i have a personal connection w him. he said he will be so depressed  if people continue to download this app. please for the love of god do not get this app
attributes.title: DONT GET

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and right when I did, my entire house got a blackout!! It didn't even load the all right when it downloaded, but it made some creepy noise and had a weird picture of an oompa loompa... It also downloaded other weird apps on my phone without my permission! DO NOT DOWNLOAD this app!! I warn you from my own experience.
attributes.title: Please, do not download!!

attributes.review: i completely regret downloading this app. in the first five minutes the app glitched and crashed. once i was able to get back onto this terrible app something popped up on the screen in some language that wasn’t american!! my husband and i fear for our lives because we believe our personal information was sent to the chinese government!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP IVE EVER DOWNLOADED
